A jinx, in popular superstition and folklore, is: A type of curse placed on a person 
that makes them prey to many minor misfortunes and other forms of bad luck;; A 
person afflicted with a similar curse, who, while not directly subject to a series of 
misfortunes, seems to attract them to anyone in his vicinity. ... can be seen as a 
jinx because it tempts fate, thereby bringing bad luck.
